doc:
David Lewis (American actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/David_Lewis_(American_actor) 0 David Lewis (October 19, 1916 – December 11, 2000) was an American actor, born in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania. He was best known for being the original actor to portray Edward Quartermaine from 1978 to 1993 on the American soap opera General Hospital. David_Lewis ( October_19_,_1916 – December_11_,_2000 ) was an_American_actor , born in Pittsburgh , Pennsylvania . He was_best_known for being the_original_actor to_portray Edward_Quartermaine from 1978 to 1993 on the_American_soap_opera_General_Hospital .
